sentences.text: 2017 NOTICE OF MEETING AND PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To our Shareholders:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I am pleased to invite you to Delphi Automotive PLCs Annual General Meeting of Shareholders to be held on Thursday, April 27, 2017, at 9:00 a.m. local time, at the Four Seasons Hotel London at Park Lane.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following Notice of Annual General Meeting of Shareholders and Proxy Statement describes the business to be conducted at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can find financial and other information about Delphi in the accompanying Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These materials are also available on Delphis website, delphi.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is very important to Delphi.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to the meeting, I encourage you to sign and return your proxy card or use telephone or Internet voting so that your shares will be represented and voted at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thank you for your continued support.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We look forward to seeing you on April 27, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Kevin P. Clark President and Chief Executive Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board currently consists of 12 members serving one-year terms.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 12 current directors are being elected at the Annual Meeting, each to serve until the 2018 annual meeting, or until such directors earlier resignation, retirement or other termination of service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has been informed that each nominee is willing to continue to serve as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a director does not receive a majority of the vote for his or her election, then that director will not be elected to the Board, and the Board may fill the vacancy with a different person, or the Board may reduce the number of directors to eliminate the vacancy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each member of our Board, other than Ms. Pinczuk and Messrs. Cantie, Clark, and Manganello, was a member of Delphi s Board prior to the Companys initial public offering in 2011, and information included in this Proxy Statement as to each members tenure on our Board reflects that service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that the combination of the various qualifications, skills, and breadth and depth of experiences of the director nominees contributes to an effective and well-functioning Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board and the Nominating and Governance Committee believe that, individually and as a whole, the directors possess the necessary qualifications to provide effective oversight of the business and quality advice and counsel to the Companys management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Included in each director nominees biography below is an assessment of each members specific qualifications, attributes, skills and experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director since: June 2015
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Joseph S. Cantie Mr. Cantie is the former Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of ZF TRW, a division of ZF Friedrichshafen AG (ZF), a global automotive supplier, a position he held from May 2015 until January 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He served in these same roles for TRW Automotive Holdings Corp., which was acquired by ZF in May 2015, since 2003.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to that time, he held other executive positions at TRW Inc., which he joined in 1999.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 1996-1999, Mr. Cantie served in several executive positions with LucasVarity Plc, including serving as Vice President and Controller.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining LucasVarity, Mr. Cantie spent 10 years with KPMG LLP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Cantie is a certified public accountant and holds a bachelor of science degree from the State University of New York at Buffalo.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Qualifications: As a seasoned financial executive, with extensive automotive supply and global public company experience, Mr. Cantie provides the Board significant enterprise risk management, financial and industry expertise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Directorships: Summit Materials, Inc. and TopBuild Corp.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Age: 53
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director since: March 2015
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Kevin P. Clark In March 2015, Mr. Clark became Delphis President and Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2014, Mr. Clark was appointed Chief Operating Officer responsible for Delphis business divisions, as well as the Global Supply Management function.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Clark joined Delphi in 2010 as Chief Financial Officer, responsible for all financial activities including strategic planning, corporate development, financial planning and analysis, treasury, accounting, and tax.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Before coming to Delphi, he was a founding partner of Liberty Lane Partners, LLC, a private equity investment firm focused on investing in and building and improving middle-market companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Clark served as Chief Financial Officer of Fisher-Scientific International Inc., a manufacturer, distributor and service provider to the global healthcare market, from the companys initial public offering in 2001 through the completion of its merger with Thermo Electron Corporation in 2006.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also held a number of senior management positions at Fisher-Scientific.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Clark began his career in the financial organization of Chrysler Corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He has both a bachelors degree in financial administration and a masters degree in finance from Michigan State University.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Qualifications: Mr. Clark is a proven leader with demonstrated success in creating and implementing Delphis business strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As our CEO and former CFO, Mr. Clark provides the Board significant strategic, financial and industry expertise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Directorships: None Age: 54
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Gary L. Cowger
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director since: November 2009
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Cowger retired as Group Vice President of Global Manufacturing and Labor Relations for General Motors in 2009, a position he held since 2005.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is currently the Chairman and CEO of GLC Ventures, LLC, a consulting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Cowger began his career with GM in 1965 and held a range of senior leadership positions in business and operations in several countries, including President of GM North America, Chairman and Managing Director, Opel, AG and President of GM de Mexico.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Cowger earned a bachelor of science degree from Kettering University and a master of science degree from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Qualifications: Through his extensive experience in the automotive industry across global markets, Mr. Cowger provides industry and operational expertise and strengthens the Boards global perspective.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Directorships: Titan International, Inc. and Tecumseh Products Company (2013-2015) Age: 69
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nicholas M. Donofrio Mr. Donofrio retired
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director since: December 2009
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Donofrio retired as Executive Vice President, Innovation & Technology at IBM in 2008.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Donofrio began his career at IBM in 1964, and worked there for more than 40 years in various positions of increasing responsibility, including Division Director; President for Advanced Workstations Division; General Manager, Large Scale Computing Division; and Senior Vice President, Technology & Manufacturing.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Donofrio earned a bachelor of science degree from Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute and holds a masters degree from Syracuse University.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Qualifications: Mr. Donofrio brings to the Board executive management skills and significant technological expertise, providing us with valuable insight regarding technology and innovation strategies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Directorships: Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. and Bank of New York Mellon Corporation Age: 71
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mark P. Frissora
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director since: December 2009
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In July 2015, Mr. Frissora became the President and Chief Executive Officer of Caesars Entertainment Corporation, a casino entertainment company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He joined Caesars in February 2015 as CEO Designate and a member of their board of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He previously served as the Chairman and CEO of Hertz Global Holdings, Inc. from 2006 to 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining Hertz, Mr. Frissora served as Chairman and CEO of Tenneco, Inc. from 2000 to 2006.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Frissora previously served for five years as a Vice President at Aeroquip-Vickers Corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 1987 to 1991, he held various management positions at Philips N.V., including Director of Marketing and Director of Sales.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to Philips, he worked for ten years at General Electric Co. in brand management, marketing and sales.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Frissora holds a bachelors degree from The Ohio State University and has completed advanced studies at both Babson College and the Thunderbird International School of Management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Qualifications: Mr. Frissora contributes expertise in automotive operations, product development, marketing and sales.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As the CEO of a global public company, Mr. Frissora also contributes talent development and strategic and financial management skills.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Directorships: Caesars Entertainment Corporation, Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc. (2009-2015) and Hertz Global Holdings, Inc. (2006-2014) Age: 61
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Gupta is former Chairman and CEO of Rohm and Haas Company, a worldwide producer of specialty materials, a position he held from 1999 to 2009.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Gupta began his career at Rohm and Haas in 1971 and served in a broad range of global operations and financial leadership roles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Leadership Structure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes it is important to retain flexibility to allocate the responsibilities of the offices of the Chairman and CEO in a manner that is in the best interests of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Currently, the Board believes it is in the best interests of the Company to separate the positions of CEO and Chairman and to have an independent Non-Executive Chairman.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rajiv L. Gupta was elected to this role on March 1, 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes this leadership structure affords the Company an effective combination of internal and external experience, continuity and independence, which will serve the Board and the Company well.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee coordinates an annual evaluation process by which the directors evaluate the Boards and its Committees performance and procedures.

sentences.text: This self-evaluation leads to a full Board discussion of the results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Committee of the Board also conducts an annual evaluation of its performance and procedures.

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Guidelines also provide that non-employee directors who significantly change their primary employment during their tenure as Board members must offer to tender their resignation to the Nominating and Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee will evaluate the continued appropriateness of Board membership under the new circumstances and make a recommendation to the Board as to any action to be taken with respect to such offer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with procedures set forth in our Memorandum and Articles of Association, shareholders holding at least ten percent of the ordinary shares outstanding and who have the right to vote at general meetings of the Company may propose, and the Nominating and Governance Committee will consider, nominees for election to the Board at the next annual meeting by giving timely written notice to the Corporate Secretary, which must be received at our principal executive offices no later than the close of business on March 9, 2018, and no earlier than November 29, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The notice periods may change in accordance with the procedures set out in our Memorandum and Articles of Association.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any such notice must include the name of the nominee, a biographical sketch and resume, contact information and such other background materials as the Nominating and Governance Committee may request.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nomination of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee recommends individuals for membership on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee considers a candidates qualities and expertise, performance, personal characteristics, diversity (inclusive of age, gender, race and ethnicity) and professional responsibilities, and also reviews the composition of the Board relative to the long- term business strategy and the challenges and needs of the Board at that time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board as a whole is constituted to be strong in its collective knowledge and diversity of accounting and finance, management and leadership, vision and strategy, business operations, business judgment, crisis management, risk assessment, industry knowledge, corporate governance and global markets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Sessions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent directors meet in executive session each Board meeting, without the CEO or any other employees in attendance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairman presides over each executive session of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Committee also convenes an executive session at which Committee members meet without the CEO or any other employees in attendance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee retained a search firm to help identify director prospects, perform candidate outreach, assist in reference and background checks, and provide other related services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The recruiting process typically involves either the search firm or a member of the Nominating and Governance Committee contacting a prospect to gauge his or her interest and availability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A candidate will then meet with several members of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the same time, the Nominating and Governance Committee and the search firm will contact references for the candidate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A background check is completed before a final recommendation is made to the Board to appoint a candidate to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Boards Role in Risk Oversight
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board takes an active role in risk oversight related to the Company both as a full Board and through its Committees, each of which has primary risk oversight responsibility with respect to all matters within the scope of its duties as contemplated by its charter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While the Companys management is responsible for day-to-day management of the various risks facing the Company, the Board is responsible for monitoring managements actions and decisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board, as apprised by the Audit Committee, determines that appropriate risk management and mitigation procedures are in place and that senior management takes the appropriate steps to manage all major risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The culture of the Board enables the Board to operate quickly and effectively in making key decisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board meetings are conducted in an environment of trust, confidentiality, open dialogue, mutual respect and constructive commentary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Ownership Guidelines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that each director should hold a meaningful equity position in the Company and has established equity holding requirements for our non-employee directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The holding requirement for each non-employee director is five times the value of his or her designated annual cash retainer (at least $500,000, based upon the current cash retainer).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each new director will have up to five full years from
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee views diversity in its broadest sense, which includes age, education, ethnicity, experience, gender, leadership qualities and race.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee will use the same selection process and criteria for evaluating all nominees, regardless of who submits the nominee for consideration.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Severance Plan provides for severance benefits in the event of a Qualifying Separation (as defined in the Severance Plan) of an Eligible Executives employment.

sentences.text: The assessment included a review of our incentive plan structures, pay practices, governance process including the Compensation Committees oversight of such programs and interviews with executives representing Accounting, Finance, HR and Internal Audit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Tax and Accounting Considerations
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 162(m) generally limits the tax deductibility of compensation paid to the chief executive officer and each of the next three most highly compensated executive officers (excluding the CFO) that exceeds $1 million in any taxable year unless the compensation over $1 million qualifies as performance-based within the meaning of Section 162(m).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is our policy to structure compensation arrangements with our executive officers to potentially qualify as performance-based so as to potentially maximize the tax deductibility of that compensation for U.S. federal income tax purposes; however, there are cases where the benefit of such tax deductibility is outweighed by the need for flexibility or the attainment of other objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee may from time to time award compensation that is not tax deductible if the Compensation Committee determines that it is in our and our shareholders best interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Moreover, even if the Compensation Committee intends to grant compensation that qualifies as performance-based compensation for purposes of Section 162(m), the Company cannot guarantee that such compensation will so qualify or ultimately will be deductible.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee and CAP reviewed the 2017 assessment and discussed the report with management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee agreed that our compensation policies, practices and programs do not create risks that are reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on Delphi.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In doing so, the Compensation Committee also reaffirmed the following key risk mitigating factors with respect to our NEOs:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mix of fixed versus variable, cash versus equity-based and short- versus long-term compensation with an emphasis on equity-based pay;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Incentive award opportunities, with performance-based awards capped at two times the target amount, that span both annual and overlapping, multiyear time periods and condition payout on a range of financial metrics (including total shareholder return);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Application of a clawback policy; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock ownership guidelines and the prohibition of hedging and pledging.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: COMPENSATION COMMITTEE REPORT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We, the undersigned members of the Compensation Committee, have reviewed and discussed the Compensation Discussion and Analysis with management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on such review and discussion, we recommended to the Board that the Compensation Discussion and Analysis be included in this Proxy Statement and incorporated by reference into our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016.

sentences.text: In this context, the Audit Committee has reviewed Delphis audited financial statements for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016 and has met and held discussions with management and Ernst & Young LLP (EY), the Companys independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management represented to the Audit Committee that Delphis consolidated financial statements for fiscal year 2016 were prepared in accordance with accounting principles generally accepted in the United States of America.

sentences.text: The discussions between the Audit Committee and EY included the matters required to be discussed by Rules on Auditing Standard No. 1301, Communications with Audit Committees, and Related and Transitional Amendments to PCAOB Standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee currently consists of Messrs. Zimmerman (Chairman), Cantie, Cowger, Mahoney, Sidlik and Wiedemann.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the members of the Audit Committee are independent directors under the NYSE listing standards and the rules of the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Board has determined that all members of the Audit Committee are financially literate under the NYSE listing standards and that each of Messrs. Zimmerman, Cantie and Mahoney qualify as an audit committee financial expert under the rules of the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee operates under a written charter adopted by the Board, which is evaluated annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The charter of the Audit Committee is available on Delphis website at delphi.com by clicking on the tab Investors and then the caption Governance Documents under the heading Corporate Governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee received the written disclosures and letter from EY required by the applicable requirements of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board regarding EYs communications with the Audit Committee concerning its independence, and the Audit Committee discussed with EY the accounting firms independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee selects, evaluates and, where deemed appropriate, replaces Delphis independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of the evaluation of the independent registered public accounting firm, the Audit Committee considers the quality and efficiency of the services provided by the independent registered public accounting firm, the independent registered public accounting firms global capabilities and independent registered public accounting firms technical expertise and knowledge of the Companys global operations and industry.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In connection with the mandated rotation of the independent registered public accounting firms lead engagement partner, the Audit Committee is directly involved in the selection of the new lead engagement partner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also pre-approves all audit services, engagement fees and terms, and all permitted non-audit engagements, except as otherwise prohibited under applicable law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based upon the Audit Committees discussions with management and EY and the Audit Committees review of the representation of management and the report of EY to the Audit Committee, the Audit Committee recommended to the Board that the audited consolidated financial statements be included in Delphis Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016, filed with the SEC.

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also considered whether non-audit services provided by EY during 2016 were compatible with maintaining their independence and concluded that such non-audit services did not affect their independence.

sentences.text: RELATIONSHIPS AND RELATED PARTY TRANSACTIONS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has adopted a written Related Party Transaction Policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to this policy, the Companys executive officers, directors and nominees for directors must promptly disclose any actual or potential material conflict of interest to our General Counsel, who will then assess and communicate the information to the Nominating and Governance Committee for evaluation and appropriate resolution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee will generally not approve or ratify a related party transaction unless it has determined that, upon consideration of all relevant information, the related party transaction is in, or not inconsistent with, the best interests of the Company and its shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If we become aware of an existing related party transaction that has not been pre-approved under our Related Party Transaction Policy, the transaction will be referred to the Nominating and Governance Committee, which will evaluate all options available, including ratification, revision or termination of such transaction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No reportable related party transactions were identified during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Solicited by Board of Directors for the Annual Meeting of Shareholders  April 27, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: David M. Sherbin, with the power of substitution, is hereby authorized to represent and vote the shares of the undersigned, with all the powers which the undersigned would possess if personally present, at the Annual Meeting of Shareholders of Delphi Automotive PLC to be held on April 27, 2017 or at any postponement or adjournment thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares represented by this proxy will be voted as directed by the shareholder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If no such directions are indicated, the Proxies will have authority to vote FOR all nominees and FOR Proposals 13 and 14.
